revision.text: Possibly: An Introduction to the Law Relative to Trials at Nisi Prius. By Francis Buller, Esq. Of the Middle Temple. 2nd ed. (London : Printed by W. Strahan and M. Woodfall, Law-Printers to the King's Most Excellent Majesty; For C. Bathhurst, opposite St. Dunstan's Church, Fleet-street, MD CC LXXV. [1775]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2445596~S1
